flavorText: It takes two to craft a mirror: a practiced metalsmith to silver one side and her own hazy reflection to polish the other.

foreignData.flavorText: Man muss zu zweit sein, um so einen Spiegel anzufertigen: eine geübte Silberschmiedin für die eine Seite und ihre eigene verschwommene Reflektion, um die andere Seite zu polieren.
foreignData.name: Verdoppelndes Glas
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Du kannst eine Nichtländerkarte aus deiner Hand spielen, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen, falls sie den gleichen Namen wie ein Zauberspruch hat, der in diesem Zug bereits gespielt wurde.

foreignData.flavorText: Hacen falta dos para hacer un espejo: un herrero para platear un lado y su propio reflejo borroso para pulir el otro.
foreignData.name: Cristal gemelificador
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Puedes jugar una carta que no sea tierra de tu mano sin pagar su coste de maná si tiene el mismo nombre que un hechizo jugado este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Il faut être deux pour façonner un miroir : un orfèvre qui appose la couche d'argent d'un côté et son reflet flou qui polit l'autre.
foreignData.name: Verre dédoublant
foreignData.text: {1}, {T} : Vous pouvez jouer une carte non-terrain de votre main sans payer son coût de mana si elle a le même nom qu'un sort qui a été joué ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: Sono necessarie due persone per fabbricare uno specchio: un fabbro provetto che ne argenti un lato e il suo nebbioso riflesso che ne lucidi l'altro.
foreignData.name: Vetro Geminato
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Puoi giocare una carta non terra dalla tua mano senza pagare il suo costo di mana se ha lo stesso nome di una magia che è stata giocata in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 鏡を作るには二人必要だ。片方を銀メッキする金属細工師と、それを裏から磨くぼやけた像と。
foreignData.name: 双子化のガラス
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}：あなたはあなたの手札にある土地でないカード１枚を、このターン、それと同じ名前の呪文がプレイされている場合、マナ・コストを支払わずにプレイしてもよい。

foreignData.flavorText: É preciso duas pessoas para fazer um espelho, um ferreiro experiente para pratear um lado e seu próprio reflexo turvo para polir o outro lado.
foreignData.name: Vidro Gêmino
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Você pode jogar um card que não seja um terreno da sua mão sem pagar seu custo de mana se ele tiver o mesmo nome de uma mágica que foi jogada neste turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Чтобы изготовить зеркало, нужны двое: умелый мастер, чтобы посеребрить одну сторону, и его собственное дымчатое отражение, чтобы отполировать вторую.
foreignData.name: Зеркало Двойников
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Вы можете разыграть не являющуюся землей карту из вашей руки без уплаты ее мана-стоимости, если у нее то же имя, что и у разыгранного в этом ходу заклинания.

foreignData.flavorText: 要花上两份工才能造出一面镜子：熟练的金属工匠在其中一面涂银，自身的模糊投影则打磨另一面。
foreignData.name: 双身镜
foreignData.text: {1}，{T}：如果你手上的某张非地牌与本回合中使用过的某咒语同名，则你可以使用该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。

name: Twinning Glass
originalText: {1}, {T}: You may play a nonland card from your hand without paying its mana cost if it has the same name as a spell that was played this turn.

rulings.text: Activating Twinning Glass’s ability allows you to cast a single card from your hand as it resolves. It doesn’t create a continuous effect, and it doesn’t let you cast multiple cards for free.
It doesn’t matter who cast the first spell.

You can’t pay any alternative costs (such as those from evoke or morph) when casting the card. On the other hand, if the card has additional costs (such as those from kicker or buyback), you may pay those.

If one half of a split card has been cast this turn, you may use Twinning Glass’s ability to cast either half of a split card with that name. For example, if Dead from Dead/Gone has been cast, you may use Twinning Glass’s ability to cast either Dead or Gone.

text: {1}, {T}: You may cast a spell from your hand without paying its mana cost if it has the same name as a spell that was cast this turn.
